game.name: PAYDAY 2: Tailor Pack 3
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, In-App Purchases, Steam Cloud, Remote Play on Phone, Remote Play on Tablet, Remote Play on TV, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 세 번째 The Tailor Pack은 각각 4가지 색상 버전이 있는 2개의 새로운 복장과 12개의 새로운 장갑으로 캐릭터를 꾸밀 수 있는 추가적인 옵션을 제공합니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: The third Tailor Pack presents additional options for character customization, including 2 new outfits with 4 color variations each, as well as 12 new gloves.
